ing: 2 (12 ounce) containers frozen whipped topping, thawed
des: "This is a very pretty dish served in a crystal bowl on a holiday buffet.  It can be used as a salad or a dessert!"
ins:
Finely chop cranberries in blender or food processor.  Place in a non-reactive bowl, cover with sugar, and let sit 4 hours.
Combine sugared cranberries with celery, walnuts, whipped topping and marshmallows; stir to coat thoroughly.  Refrigerate until serving.
